text: Reinhold Roth (4 March 1953 â€“ 15 October 2021) was a German Grand Prix motorcycle road racer. He won the French Grand Prix in 1987, and finished the season in second place in 1989. He also won the Dutch and Czechoslovakian Grand Prix. Roth retired in 1990. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2021 deaths Category:German sportspeople Category:Motorcycle racers
title: Reinhold Roth
